bike.description: Full mid-modulus carbon fiber, Dyad Plus lay-up, shaped-optimized top and down tubes, 1.5 - 1 1/8" tapered head tube, PressFit30 BB shell, High Direct Mount (HDM) front derailleur with internal cable routing, over-sized stays with post mount disc brakes & 12x142mm drop-out, stainless steel chain stay protector, replaceable derailleur hanger

components.description: Fox 32 Float 650B CTD Evolution Series w/3-position compression & lock-out,15mm axle, air spring compression, rebound adjust, tapered alloy steerer, 100mm travel
FSA Orbit 1.5 Zero-Stack internal cup, for tapered head tube, 30mm shim stack
WTB Frequency Race i19 TCS 650B tubeless rims, Formula hubs w/ sealed cartridge bearings, stainless spokes
SRAM X9 rear and X7 HDM front
Avid Elixir 7 hydraulic disc brakes with 160 mm front & rear HS1 rotors
Ritchey Pro Riser bar, 31.8 x 9JAMIS_DEGREE sweep x 20mm rise x 710mm
